类 EditRepresentativesAction

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class EditRepresentativesAction
extends PatientBaseAction
    Edits a patient's personal representatives. Used by hcp/editRepresentatives.jsp
    作者:
    laurenhayward

    • 构造器详细资料

      • EditRepresentativesAction

        public EditRepresentativesAction(DAOFactory factory,
                         long loggedInMID,
                         java.lang.String pidString)
                          throws iTrustException
        Super class validates the patient mid
        参数:
        factory - The DAOFactory used in creating the DAOs for this action.
        loggedInMID - The MID of the patient editing his/her representatives.
        pidString - The MID of the representative in question.
        抛出:
        iTrustException

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRepresented

        public java.util.List<PatientBean> getRepresented(long pid)
                                           throws iTrustException
        Return a list of patients that pid represents
        参数:
        pid - The id of the personnel we are looking up representees for.
        返回:
        a list of PatientBeans
        抛出:
        iTrustException

      • addRepresentative

        public java.lang.String addRepresentative(java.lang.String pidString)
                                   throws iTrustException
        Makes the patient (pid) represent the input mid parameter
        参数:
        pidString - the mid of the person who will be represented (the representee)
        返回:
        a message
        抛出:
        iTrustException

      • removeRepresentative

        public java.lang.String removeRepresentative(java.lang.String input)
                                      throws iTrustException
        Makes the patient (pid) no longer represent the input mid param
        参数:
        input - the mid of the person be represented (representee)
        返回:
        a message
        抛出:
        iTrustException
